metadata.title: CVE-2020-6505 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in speech in Google Chrome prior to 83.0.4103.106 allowed aremote attacker to potentially perform a sandbox escape via a crafted HTMLpage.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
